item.name: Ki-rin's Guidance
entries: The string is made from its hair, the riser is made from its carved horn, limbs made from its sculpted bones. When you lunch an arrow from this weapon, the arrow transforms into a {@spell Guiding Bolt} of light. On a hit, the target takes {@dice 4d6} radiant damage, and all your subsequent attacks from this weapon ignores target's AC from dexterity modifier. When you attack a creature with the Ki-rin's Guidance and roll a 20 on the attack roll, further attacks automatically hit until either the target or you're unconscious.

item.name: Spirit String Bow
entries: When the string is pulled an ethereal arrow forms. The arrows are considered magical weapons in terms of resistance. You can fire twice every time you attack as you don't have to spend time to get an arrow from your quiver.

item.name: Morningstar of the Dawn
entries: Can cast Searing Smite a number of times equal to the wielder’s proficiency, recharges {@dice 1d4} per dawn.

item.name: The Great Annihilator's Fang
entries: A very large fang with a slight curve. In darkness, you can see shadows bend towards it. You can use your bonus action to command it. It has a flying speed of up to 40 feet, but it can only travel in a straight line during a turn. It deals 1d4 force damage. You add your spellcasting modifier to both attack and damage rolls. If you kill a creature with it, the creature turns into a shadow and absorbed by the fang. The fang then grants you an extra action you have to use before you end your turn. If you try to throw it, it hangs in the air after leaving your hand. Curse: It channels The Great Annihilator's shadow to you. The Great Annihilator comes to you in your dreams, both trying to consume you and trying to make you spread His shadows.
